Materials

There are two core texts for this course. One is only available in print, but there are short-loan copies in the library and the softcover is inexpensive. The other is available free online but may be ordered in print form as well.

  • Bueno de Mesquita, Ethan & Fowler, Anthony. 2021. Thinking Clearly with Data: A Guide to Quantitative Reasoning and Analysis

  • Huntington-Klein, Nick. 2021 The Effect: An Introduction to Research Design and Causality

Under each lecture view you will find the required readings for each unit. You can return to the lecture view using the link in the upper left.
